data.title: Customer Reviews of The Cher Show
data.meta_description: Customer reviews of The Cher Show at the Wang Theater, Boston, MA. The Cher Show hits the stage this year!. Closed March 17, 2024. Closed March 17, 2024.  Buy tickets online now or find out more with Boston Theater
data.text:
Average customer review: (4.6 Stars)

Number of reviews: 5

Page:1All

Sort:

Torri Dailey from Boston, Massachusetts

FAMILY OF WEALTHY STAR QUALITY ARMENIAN ITALIAN QUEENS.

I will see the show for the second time . This time I’m older and it means something special to me and my family. She is always a good influencer. I’m counting on this show to save me I feel lonely without gregg allman. I know 100 %. This is the most sought after show on the world. You drive me to new heights & your amazingly fast. I’m a fan for lifer.

Marlene Kramer from Sarasota, Florida

HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Great show. Amazing costumes and costume changes. I don't know how they did that. The acoustics and sight line were great. Would see it again.

Karen Rohde from Utica, New York

THE CHER SHOW

The show was amazing, very well written and the actors were all incredible. Total 5 Star

Jimmy Mercedes from Boston, Massachusetts

FUNNY, HEARTWARMING AND INSPIRATIONAL

This show has it all! From beginning to end it made me laugh almost made me cry and inspired me to never give up on a dream. The cast was amazing the costumes were wonderful and vivid. The show takes you on a musical journey of the ups and downs of Cher's life and career. The writing and performances are something to remember. I will see it again and invite a few friends because the Cher Show is an experience that shouldn't be missed.

JG from Kansas City, Missouri

OKAY. NOT BAD.

Cast was good. Songs were Cher songs. It moved along well. I liked it perhaps better than I thought I would. I’m not a Cher fan. My wife enjoyed it more. I love live theater and I am glad I went. However, I don’t feel the need to see it again.
